name: reaction-button-slack
title: Slack-style Reaction Button
oneLiner: A Slack-style reaction button showing all reactions with counts and click-to-react

apiDoc.name: ReactionButtonSlack
apiDoc.description: Slack-style reaction display showing all reaction types with their counts and avatars. In horizontal mode, avatars appear in tooltips; in vertical mode, they're displayed inline. By default, filters avatars to show only followed users (onlyFollows=true) for cleaner display. Each reaction type is clickable to add/remove your reaction. Supports delayed publishing for undo functionality.

props.name: showAvatars
props.description: Show user avatars (in tooltip for horizontal, inline for vertical)

props.name: onlyFollows
props.description: When true and user is logged in, only displays avatars from users the current user follows

props.name: delayed
props.description: Delay in seconds before publishing (for cancellable reactions)
